name: Ride Jumper
description:
The amusement park is about to close but you're not ready to leave!

Jump from one whacky futuristic amusement park ride to the next with crazy physics and a surprising amount of blood!

Controls:

  • SPACE to jump
  • Left/Right for air control

Made on the 2015 Train Jam by:

  • Kevin Zuhn @KevinZuhn
  • Jamie Sanchez @spacedragon
  • Tom Eastman @TrinketTom
Song: Rainbows and Unicorns - Phyrnna

Secret controls: R to Restart, F2 to Win
